english.segment1: Pace is picking up. Tempo changing slowly gradually hardly noticeable. One beat per minute becomes two and two makes four. Now where is that door
english.segment2: To reality check me out and in and out of this motel rooms. It's unbelievable is this retrievable. I think I better leave
english.segment3: Pretty nights flashing photo lights. I feel all right as long as smiles are shining bright. What a game what a night. I feel all right I said. Pretty nights pretty nights but got nothing to say
english.segment4: Who touched the volume knob. Has it always been this loud. Allowed it to go from one. Does this one go to eleven. I think I better leave
english.segment5: Nothing is silent except the thoughts in my head. And all those words have been said. Feels unbelievable are they retrievable. Because all I do is scream to overpower this noise
english.segment6: Pretty nights flashing photo lights. I feel all right as long as smiles are shining bright. What a game what a night. I feel all right I said. Pretty nights pretty nights but got nothing to say
english.segment7: Pace is picking up tempo changing the common normal. Normalized us and paralyzed us and left us with a sadness. And now it's hovering in the air in between our eyes. I know we can find our way around. Around if we can only find the time. Time we don't have but that has been given
english.segment8: Pretty nights flashing photo lights. I feel all right as long as smiles are shining bright. What a game what a night. I feel all right I said. Pretty nights pretty nights but got nothing to say
